idea-plugin.name: Navigate Url From Literal
idea-plugin.description: Enables navigation from any matching string literal or xml attribute value or xml text to a url defined by url rules. To create url rules, create a file called navigate-url-plugin.properties at the root of any module. Example file contents (This would make a string like "GD16-123", when clicked, navigate to ttps://mysite.atlassian.net/browse/GD16-123: url1.startsWith=GD16- url1.navigateTo=https://mysite.atlassian.net/browse/{0}
